description: Creates a new cross-cluster search connection from a source domain to a destination domain.

parameters.name: SourceDomainInfo
parameters.description: Specifies the DomainInformation for the source Elasticsearch domain. OwnerId (string) --- The name of an Elasticsearch domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen). Region (string) ---

nested_params.name: DomainName
nested_params.description: The name of an Elasticsearch domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen).

parameters.name: DestinationDomainInfo
parameters.description: Specifies the DomainInformation for the destination Elasticsearch domain. OwnerId (string) --- The name of an Elasticsearch domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen). Region (string) ---

nested_params.name: DomainName
nested_params.description: The name of an Elasticsearch domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen).

parameters.name: ConnectionAlias
parameters.description: Specifies the connection alias that will be used by the customer for this connection.

nested_items.name: SourceDomainInfo
nested_items.description: Specifies the DomainInformation for the source Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The name of an Elasticsearch domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen).

nested_items.name: DestinationDomainInfo
nested_items.description: Specifies the DomainInformation for the destination Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The name of an Elasticsearch domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen).

nested_items.name: ConnectionAlias
nested_items.description: Specifies the connection alias provided during the create connection request.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies the OutboundCrossClusterSearchConnectionStatus for the newly created connection.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: The state code for outbound connection. This can be one of the following:
VALIDATING: The outbound connection request is being validated.
VALIDATION_FAILED: Validation failed for the connection request.
PENDING_ACCEPTANCE: Outbound connection request is validated and is not yet accepted by destination domain owner.
PROVISIONING: Outbound connection request is in process.
ACTIVE: Outbound connection is active and ready to use.
REJECTED: Outbound connection request is rejected by destination domain owner.
DELETING: Outbound connection deletion is in progress.
DELETED: Outbound connection is deleted and cannot be used further.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Specifies verbose information for the outbound connection status.

nested_items.name: CrossClusterSearchConnectionId
nested_items.description: Unique id for the created outbound connection, which is used for subsequent operations on connection.
